abilities.name: Adorable Visage
abilities.description: The everpup relies heavily on its lovable appearance to dissuade hostility. While it is not incapacitated, it adds its charisma bonus to its AC.

abilities.name: Vitality Consumption
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the Everpup creates a 30 ft aura around itself which drains the vitality of other creatures. When a creature enters the aura for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the everpup can choose to force it to attempt a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. If a creature is unconsious, it attempts the saving throw at disadvantage. On a failed save, the creature sufferes a level of exhaustion. For each level of exhaustion inflicted this was, the everpup magically regains 10 hit points. The everpup can end the effect of the aura as a bonus action. If a sleeping creature succeeds on a saving throw against this affect, it immediately regains conciousness.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target
Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage

actions.name: Imploring Bleat
actions.description: When in danger, the everpup lets out a piteous cry, hoping to coerve other creatures to come to its aid. Each creature of its choice within 60 ft that can hear the everpup must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, or be charmed by the Everpup and regard any creatures hostile to the everpup as an enemy. A charmed creature will act to protect and aide the helpless everpup to the best of its ability, attending to its every desire. A creature may attempt the saving throw again at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature who scceedes on any saving throw against this effect is immune to the effect for 24 hours. If a creature fails the saving throw three times in a row, the charm becomes permanent, lasting until the everpup is killed or the effect is removed.

actions.name: Soporific Exhale (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: The everpup lets out an adorable, dusty sneeze. Each creature in a 15 ft cone must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, each creature with less than 12d10 hit points drops prone and enters a deep sleep. On a success, the creature takes half the result rolled as psychic damage as it resists falling sleep. This sleep ends if a creature takes damage or if another creature uses their action to shake them awake.

actions.name: Drowsy Getaway (Reaction)
actions.description: When the everpup is hit by an attack, and the attacker is within 5 ft of it, the everpup creates a puff of dust from its hide that momentarily clouds the area of the attacker. The attacker must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of their next turn.
